attributes.action: Implement the planned vehicle tracking and road pricing policy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The effects of climate change are becoming increasingly apparent.  Pollution is creating huge future costs.  We can start to limit that impact today by polluting less.  Road pricing creates disincentives to pollute and a fairer allocation of tax payer's money.  Sign up to implement the planned vehicle tracking and road policy and make a positive contribution to the future of our country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
